mapper.select: SELECT emp_id, fk_dept_id, name, password, tel, personal_mail, hire_date, mail, leader_id, G.grade_name, postcode, address, detailaddress, extraaddress, gender, birthday, fk_grade_no, NVL(D.manager_id, -1) AS manager_id, status, pwdchangedate, pwdchangestatus, leave_count, profile_img, trunc( months_between(sysdate, pwdchangedate) ) AS pwdchangegap FROM tbl_employee E JOIN tbl_department D ON E.fk_dept_id = D.dept_id JOIN tbl_grade G ON E.fk_grade_no = G.grade_no WHERE emp_id = #{emp_id} AND password = #{password} ANd status != 3
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_employee SET pwdchangestatus = 0 WHERE emp_id = #{emp_id}
UPDATE tbl_employee SET password = #{newPwd} WHERE emp_id = #{emp_id}
UPDATE tbl_employee SET pwdchangestatus = 1 WHERE emp_id = #{emp_id}
